com.mapdigit.gis.raster

Class RasterMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayer
      • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayerContainer
        • com.mapdigit.gis.DigitalMap
          • com.mapdigit.gis.raster.RasterMap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapClient, VectorMap

    public class RasterMap
extends DigitalMap
    RasterMap a map class uses to display raster map.
    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
